column5: Huge 3000 sq ft home close to art, culture, restaurants, & dining. Family-friendly and only minutes to downtown. Take the rail downtown to SB activities or to NRG Stadium. When you are done enjoying the fun, just hop on the rail to your quiet home  You'll love my place because of its closeness to downtown and Heights, availability of rail service, and the ambiance. Great for families, couples, adventurers, business travelers and big groups. Fully equipped for 8 to stay comfortably.
